description.description: A defender who charges at enemies in the distance and utilizes her barrier to the fullest.

introduction.introduction:
Hilde, when geared up with Tech Level 5 Buster Cores, becomes a defender who pushes enemies away and uses her barrier and high defense capability to endure prolonged battles.

　Dragon Buster Regin and Fafnir are solely created to withstand the power of Hilde's Qliphoth Factor. Records says they hibernated for a long time before they were reactivated by a recent battle with the Replacers.
　This duo serves as an accelerator and a discharger, and they perform best when paired up with each other.
　Theoretically, they have endless potential because they have no output limits. But since they can only be activated by the specific Factor inside Hilde, they're useless to other Counters.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Swings her sword along with Fafnir and Regin, inflicting AoE damage.

When deployed, instantly knocks targets in an 800-reach radius backward in the direction she's facing. Charges at a target at least 300 reach away from her, inflicting AoE damage upon collision and forcing it to attack her for 3 seconds. Decreases Special Skill cooldown by 3 seconds when cast.

level5.level5: An noncancelable barrier by 8% of Max HP around all allies for 8 s upon deployment Special skill cooldown -5 s instead

baseDescription.baseDescription: Leaps backward into the air and crashes onto the ground, inflicting AoE damage. Afterwards, creates a noncancelable barrier by 25% of Max HP and becomes immune to all kinds of Hitstun for this barrier's duration.

level5.level5: Role DISADV RES +100% for barrier duration

baseDescription.baseDescription: Charges forward and inflicts AoE damage on contact with the first enemy in her path. Decreases DMG Taken by 30% and immune to all non-Permanent debuffs for 10 seconds afterward.

level5.level5: Casts Special skill ignoring its cooldown during the buff.
